cards.title: Abomination
cards.description: Gets +3 if there is a Munchkin in the fight who's not using Light, Heavy or Energy weapon against it.
cards.bad_stuff: While you're running away you're finding new and new troubles. Keep searching the discard pile from top to bottom until you find a Trap that can affect you, it automaticaly triggers on you. If there is no such Trap lose 2 levels.
